com.io7m.jspatial

Class MutableArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jspatial.MutableArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundingAreaType

    public final class MutableArea
extends Object
implements BoundingAreaType
    A trivial mutable area class, provided for convenience and intended to be passed to various area-consuming QuadTreeType methods.
